column4: RocketDock provides a dock similar to what the Apple Mac does
thanks. nyqvist, most of us use Avant Window Manager (awn) but there are several docks, cairo dock is good too
I didn't know Docky existed, I use AWN, I used Cairo Dock once too, both are good; I'll try Docky thanks for the tip
Now, why does my second "scroll button" swing me from workspace to workspace on occasion?
it is a compiz option, if you want to get rid of it install ccsm

don't worry, works perfectly fine with metacity, ccsm is a GUI to configure compiz, it comes with other plug ins; there you'll find workspace switcher and within the option to disable the mouse wheel option
excellent: the "mouse wheel" is actually a feature of my trackpad - and I hate having compiz swipe it that way...
I think was looking for that "CCSM" before...
thanks! I think I found it!
no more flipping workspaces by accident...
I'm glad you solved it, ccsm is really neat, try all the plug ins, some of theme are extremely useful
